channel.title: Pocketnow Weekly Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Pocketnow
channel.itunes:subtitle: Tech news and opinion from the team at Pocketnow.com
channel.itunes:summary: Mobile-tech talk and lame jokes from the informative yet unrefined team at Pocketnow. Covering smartphones, tablets, wearables and other gadgets you dreamed of owning when you were young. Stitcher Award winner: Best Technology Podcast, 2013
channel.description: Mobile-tech talk and lame jokes from the informative yet unrefined team at Pocketnow. item.title: Where is Nick's Galaxy S20? Also, an ode to MWC 2020.
item.itunes:title: Where is Nick's Galaxy S20? Also, an ode to MWC 2020.
item.itunes:subtitle: JV shares some early thoughts on the Galaxy 20 Ultra and then shares some stories from past Mobile World Congress visits.
item.description:
Nick Gray (editor-in-chief of Phandroid) returns to share some stories from our past years in Barcelona for Mobile World Congress, after lamenting a little bit about the fact that his Samsung devices haven't come in yet. In an ode to MWC 2020, the two symbolically pour one out for this year's show which is still kind of going thanks to a few companies who decided to still have their events. We hope our friends who are still in Barcelona are having a great time drinking wine without us.


Become part of the conversation on Twitter by mentioning @pocketnow and @jvtechtea with the hashtag #PNWeekly!


Follow our guests!

Nick Gray (Phandroid) ---

http://youtube.com/phandroid

http://phandroid.com

http://twitter.com/phandroid

http://twitter.com/nickmgray


Follow our host!

Joshua Vergara (JV) ---

http://youtube.com/joshuavergara

http://twitter.com/jvtechtea

http://instagram.com/jvtechtea

item.title: Unpacking the Galaxy Z Flip and the MWC cancellation
item.itunes:title: Unpacking the Galaxy Z Flip and the MWC cancellation
item.itunes:subtitle: A couple special guests bring their thoughts on Samsung's latest announcements and Mobile World Congress ending
item.description:
Unpacked was a very interesting event, with Samsung announcing not just their Galaxy S20 line but also their latest foldable, the Galaxy Z Flip. Thunder E of Booredatwork joined me at the Samsung Creator's Lounge after the event wrapped up to talk about the Z Flip and why it's an interesting follow up to the Galaxy Fold.


Our exit from Unpacked brought a major plot twist -- GSMA completely cancelling Mobile World Congress 2020. With the loss of one of the year's most important trade shows, Nick Gray of Phandroid shares his thoughts with JV. After years of MWC, its loss in 2020 automatically makes this one of the most unique and different times in the tech industry.


Become part of the conversation on Twitter by mentioning @pocketnow and @jvtechtea with the hashtag #PNWeekly! Give your thoughts on the questions regarding the Galaxy Z Flip and the implications of social media in our headline-sharing society.


Follow our guests!

Thunder E of Booredatwork ---

http://youtube.com/booredatwork

http://twitter.com/booredatwork

http://instagram.com/booredatwork


Nick Gray (Phandroid) ---

http://youtube.com/phandroid

http://phandroid.com

http://twitter.com/phandroid

http://twitter.com/nickmgray


Follow our host!

Joshua Vergara (JV) ---

http://youtube.com/joshuavergara

item.title: How Coronavirus is affecting MWC 2020
item.itunes:title: How Coronavirus is affecting MWC 2020
item.itunes:subtitle: The world emergency has many implications for the year's biggest mobile tech show.
item.description:
Today's episode is an exploration of the affects of the Coronavirus and how it has caused certain companies and vendors to pull out of Mobile World Congress 2020. Though Barcelona is deemed a generally safe zone in this particular crisis, the mass travel to and from Asia into Spain has many people contemplating their presence at the year's biggest tech show. GSMA, the organizers of the show, just recently sent an email to registered attendees that JV talks a bit through in this episode.


Become part of the conversation on Twitter by mentioning @pocketnow and @jvtechtea with the hashtag #PNWeekly! Give your thoughts on the questions regarding the Galaxy Z Flip and the implications of social media in our headline-sharing society.


Follow our host!

Joshua Vergara (JV) ---

http://youtube.com/joshuavergara

http://twitter.com/jvtechtea

http://instagram.com/jvtechtea


Subscribe: http://bit.ly/pocketnowsub

http://pocketnow.com


Follow us:

http://flipboard.com/@Pocketnow

item.title: Samsung is Z FLIPPING out (and so are we?)
item.itunes:title: Samsung is Z FLIPPING out (and so are we?)
item.itunes:subtitle: How excited are you for the Galaxy Z Flip?
item.description:
A week full of leaks ended with an actual look at Samsung's upcoming flip phone, the Galaxy Z Flip! After seeing what could be considered the spiritual successor to the Galaxy Fold, JV gives us some thoughts on why the smart flip phone form factor is equal parts exciting and problematic. Don't get him wrong, though -- he still wants some. After that, JV ponders the role of social media after tragedies and big news stories like the ones we experienced last week.


Become part of the conversation on Twitter by mentioning @pocketnow and @jvtechtea with the hashtag #PNWeekly! Give your thoughts on the questions regarding the Galaxy Z Flip and the implications of social media in our headline-sharing society.


Follow our host!

Joshua Vergara (JV) ---

http://youtube.com/joshuavergara

http://twitter.com/jvtechtea

http://instagram.com/jvtechtea


Subscribe: http://bit.ly/pocketnowsub

http://pocketnow.com


Follow us:

http://flipboard.com/@Pocketnow

http://facebook.com/pocketnow

http://twitter.com/pocketnow

http://instagram.com/pocketnow


Graphics provided by: Motionvfx.com

item.title: TK Bay takes a BYTE out of the Galaxy S20
item.itunes:title: TK Bay takes a BYTE out of the Galaxy S20
item.itunes:subtitle: A new creative platform that replaces Vine goes right up against TK's fave, TikTok! Also, more talk about the Galaxy S20!
item.description:
TikTok addict TK Bay returns to the podcast to recount some stories from CES, from which JV has a long overdue rant regarding third party text-based travel services. TK and JV are both going to be at Unpacked soon, too, so they discuss the leaks and information we currently know about Samsung's latest device, the Galaxy S20/S20+/S20 Ultra!


Follow our guests and host!

TK Bay --

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQN7NhtBqADmNaRA3yc_mAQ

http://twitter.com/tkdsl8655

http://instagram.com/tkdsl8655

http://xdadevelopers.com


Joshua Vergara (JV) ---

http://youtube.com/joshuavergara

http://twitter.com/jvtechtea

http://instagram.com/jvtechtea
